title: Biden issues a new executive order relating to hostages and detained Americans
content:
1. Biden issues a new executive order relating to hostages and detained Americans  NPR
  2. Biden to sign executive order to build on efforts to bring American hostages home  Fox News
  3. Biden to sign executive order aiming to deter taking of U.S. hostages, wrongful detentions  CNBC
  4. White House unveils new executive order on US hostages and wrongful detainees  CNN
  5. Biden to sign executive order on Americans held hostage or wrongfully detained abroad  ABC News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
